checklist: Chrome extension manifest.json permissions: are they minimal and correct for Manifest V3?
Content script injection safety: XSS vectors in DOM manipulation
Background service worker lifecycle: does it handle being terminated and restarted?
Message passing between content script, background, and popup: are there race conditions?
Storage API usage: chrome.storage vs localStorage correctness and quota handling
URL pattern matching in content_scripts: too broad or too narrow?
Error handling in async chrome API calls (chrome.runtime.lastError patterns)
CORS and fetch issues in background script when calling backend API
Popup script: event listeners, DOM ready timing, and state management bugs
Backend API authentication: JWT/token handling, session management vulnerabilities
Extension <-> Backend API contract: are endpoints, payloads, and auth consistent?
Frontend <-> Backend API contract: mismatched routes, missing error responses
Database models vs API response shapes: are there missing fields or type mismatches?
State management in frontend (Zustand stores): stale state, missing updates, race conditions
Backend router organization and middleware chain (CORS, auth, error handling)
Product scraping logic in content.js: fragile selectors, missing error handling
Collection/product relationship integrity in database models
Search implementation: SQL injection, missing indexes, query correctness
Docker Compose service wiring: port mapping, environment variables, dependencies
Frontend routing and navigation: dead routes, missing guards, broken links
Uncaught promise rejections and missing try/catch blocks in async code
Chrome extension popup.js: null reference errors when DOM elements missing
Backend Python exception handling: bare except, missing error responses
Frontend component error boundaries and loading/error states
Hardcoded URLs, API endpoints, or configuration values
Missing input validation on forms (login, register, product save)
Dead code, unused imports, unreachable branches
Memory leaks: event listeners not cleaned up, intervals not cleared
Inconsistent error message formats between backend and frontend
Missing loading states and user feedback for async operations
